Util¶

ccpnmr.analysis.core.Util.changeSpectrumContourLevels(analysisSpectrum, levelChanger, changeMode='multiply')¶

Descrn: Change the contour levels of a spectrum by a given factor Inputs: Analysis.AnalysisSpectrum, Float, Word (multiply or add) Output: None
